title: Fork, ca. 1700
medium: shark skin, silver, brass, steel, amber
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Two long pointed tines, curved shoulders and baluster-shaped neck. Pistol-shaped handle of clear amber. Silver lion on top of handle sitting straight up, looking backwards, his forelegs resting on a ball (?).

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. shark skin, silver, brass, steel, amber. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-136-c.
